text: 10 years ago Tiger Woods went into akron
ohio for a tournament he was ranked
number one in the world he was nearing
25 million dollars in earnings he was
the sports golden boy he could do no
wrong on the course he was also the
darling of every corporate sponsors
brand name from Buick powerful engine
smooth ride in a booming sound system
well ten years later it's a very
different story the first round of the
bridge don't invitation was underway in
Akron and people are tuning in to watch
tiger for very different reasons it's
been quite a dramatic decline for Tiger
Woods over the past couple of years as
off the course problems everyone knows
about I am deeply sorry for my
irresponsible and selfish behavior I
engaged in he's had injuries with his
Achilles tendon his knee and also
recently he unceremoniously dumped his
longtime caddie Steve Williams and in
Akron the man carrying the bag for Tiger
Woods this is high school buddy Brian
Bell he knows Tiger perhaps better than
anyone but he doesn't have much
experience as a professional golf caddy
dolphins used to tune in to watch tiger
woods because it was like watching a
person who had perfected an art form he
was at the top of his game and people
had never seen anything like him on a
golf course but now it's almost like the
irresistible nature of looking at a car
crash on the side of the road
